source: Með tilliti til 2. mgr. 25. gr. tilskipunar 95/46/EB, og að því er varðar alla starfsemi sem fellur undir gildissvið þeirrar tilskipunar, telst Ungverjaland tryggja nægilega vernd persónuupplýsinga sem eru sendar frá bandalaginu.
target: For the purposes of Article 25(2) of Directive 95/46/EC, for all the activities falling within the scope of that Directive, Hungary is considered as providing an adequate level of protection of personal data transferred from the Community.
